00037 #include "egs_transformed_source.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 EGS_TransformedSource::EGS_TransformedSource(EGS_Input *input,
00041     EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSource(input,f), source(0), T(0) {
00042     EGS_Input *isource = input->takeInputItem("source",false);
00043     if( isource ) {
00044         source = EGS_BaseSource::createSource(isource); delete isource;
00045     }
00046     if( !source ) {
00047         string sname; int err = input->getInput("source name",sname);
00048         if( err )
00049             egsWarning("EGS_TransformedSource: missing/wrong inline source "
00050               "definition and missing wrong 'source name' input\n");
00051         else {
00052             source = EGS_BaseSource::getSource(sname);
00053             if( !source ) egsWarning("EGS_TransformedSource: a source named %s"
00054                     " does not exist\n");
00055         }
00056     }
00057     EGS_AffineTransform *t = EGS_AffineTransform::getTransformation(input);
00058     setUp(t); delete t;
00059 }
00060 
00061 void EGS_TransformedSource::setUp(EGS_AffineTransform *t) {
00062     setTransformation(t);
00063     otype = "EGS_TransformedSource";
00064     if( !isValid() ) description = "Invalid transformed source";
00065     else {
00066         description = "Transformed ";
00067         description += source->getSourceDescription();
00068         source->ref();
00069     }
00070 }
00071 
00072 extern "C" {
00073 
00074 EGS_TRANSFORMED_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_BaseSource* createSource(EGS_Input *input,
00075         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) { return
00076     createSourceTemplate<EGS_TransformedSource>(input,f,"transformed source");
00077 }
00078 
00079 }
